content: Phase 1.1: Update discount expiry logic - Modify discount_routes.py to calculate expiry: 15%=1day, 10%=3days, 5%=7days
Phase 1.2: Hide discount codes in UI - Remove code display from FirstTimeDiscountPopup and MaryWellChat, show confirmation messages only
Phase 1.3: Implement auto-apply discount system - Update discount schema with lead_id/session_id, create /api/discounts/active endpoint
Phase 1.4: Add Fizze Admin tab - Create 7th tab in Admin.jsx with full CRUD interface for drinks management
Phase 1.5: Update checkout flow - Auto-apply discounts without manual code entry, display discount in summary
Phase 1.6: Update mary_well.py - Remove code display from discount generation, pass percentage for expiry calculation
Phase 1.7: Test and verify all Phase 1 fixes with screenshots
Phase 2: Role-Based Access Control - Create roles.py, update auth.py, implement permission system
Phase 3: Social Media Integrations - Get integration playbooks for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok
Phase 4: SEO Optimization - Add meta tags, structured data, sitemap, analytics
Phase 5: Comprehensive Testing - Call testing agent, review report, fix all bugs
Phase 6: Production Prep - Document environment vars, create runbook, verify supervisor config
